name: Metal Parts World(Full Stack)
description: This is a manufacturing website where users can place an order and the user has a dashboard where he/she can cancel those orders, Users can buy a product (with a payment system), Add reviews on this site and see or update his/her profiles. An admin can add or delete products, see and delete all ordered products, Add delivery status, An admin can see or update his/her profiles and he/she can delete a user or make an admin from the user's list on the dashboard. Have a good authentication system and fully responsive
tools: ['ReactJs', 'React-bootstrap','React hook form', 'React query', 'json web token', 'Node js', 'MongoDB','Firebase', 'Express js', 'Stripe']
